intro: Hello. Welcome to AmisDrift. (PRESS ENTER TO ADVANCE TEXT)
This tutorial is meant to guide you through the base mechanics of the game.
You've been given a test driver car for the purpose of this map.
driving: Use WASD to control your car.
W and S move forward and backward, and A and D steer your car left and right.
Each car in-game has different statistics, so your car may not be as fast as this one.
driving_2: Driving on a road is preferred.
Driving on grass slows down your car.
